methods.name: addTrackedTaskListener
methods.comment:
Adds a listener that will be notified when tasks are tracked (when they are added and
 removed from tracking).

methods.javadoc:
Removes the given listener added via {@link #addTrackedTask(Task,TaskMonitor)}.
@param listener The listener that needs to be removed.
methods.name: removeTrackedTaskListener
methods.comment: Removes the given listener added via #addTrackedTask(Task,TaskMonitor).

params.name: listener
params.comment: The listener that needs to be removed.

methods.name: addTrackedTask
methods.comment:
Adds a Task to the list of tasks that have not yet finished running.  
 
 Note: it is safe to add the same task more than once, as it will not be repeatedly 
 tracked.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: the task monitor for the given task

methods.javadoc:
Removes the Task to the list of tasks that have not yet finished running.
@param task The task to stop watching.
methods.name: removeTrackedTask
methods.comment: Removes the Task to the list of tasks that have not yet finished running.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if there are tasks that are running or need to be run.
@return true if there are tasks that are running or need to be run.
methods.name: isExecutingTasks
methods.comment: Returns true if there are tasks that are running or need to be run.

return.comment: true if there are tasks that are running or need to be run.

methods.name: isTaskRunning
methods.comment: Returns true if the task with the indicated title is running.

params.name: title
params.comment: the title of the desired task

return.comment: true if the task with the indicated title is running.
